item.title: Posterior samples
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: Hugh Possinghamâ€™s lab at UQ is advertising four postdoc positions. Two from an ARC Laureate Fellowship and two through the ARC Centre of Excellence for Environmental Decisions. The positions are three years full time and focus on mathematics and statistics rather than ecological fieldwork. The International Agency for Research on Cancer has a postdoc position as well. I had my PhD graduation ceremony yesterday.
